snippet: A reporter for the Washington Post in Iran who has been detained for over four months was charged on Saturday, the newspaper reported, quoting a source familiar with the case....

headline.print_headline: Washington Post Reporter in Tehran Charged
headline.main: Washington Post Reporter in Tehran Charged

lead_paragraph: A reporter for the Washington Post in Iran who has been detained for over four months was charged on Saturday, the newspaper reported, quoting a source familiar with the case.
